ProductInfo.Features:
Cortex-A9 processor and quad core RK3188 1.6GHz chip;  Android 4.2.2 operating system;  Mali-400 graphic processor
9.7" 10-point capacitive Retina touch screen with 2048x1536 resolution and 24bit color
Supports HDMI output and connection with HDTVs;  Supports automatic screenshot, picture-in-picture and 4K video playback functions
Built-in gyroscope and supports G-sensor;  Built-in Bluetooth module;  Enjoy a fast internet with Wi-Fi or external 3G
Supports OTG function for connection with mouse, keyboard, USB flash drive or mobile disk;  2.0 MP front camera and 5.0 MP rear camera with auto focus & flash light functions
ProductInfo.Name: PiPo MAX-M6 RK3188 Quad Core 1.6 GHz 9.7" Inch Retina IPS Screen Android 4.2.2 16GB Tablet PC (Black)
